name: Knee Deep in the Snow
description:
-What?-

The snowmen are unexpectedly revolting!

Gun them all down with Christmas bulbs to clear each wave. How long can you survive the onslaught?

- Controls -

  • Move: WASD
  • Look/Aim: MOUSE
  • Shoot: LEFT CLICK
  • Pause: ENTER
  • Map: TAB

Made in around 48 hours for the Raylib 9 Years Game Jam. 

- Credits -

  • Programming: Tristan Termini
  • Art/Music: Basil Termini
  • Sound Design: Dorian Termini
